title: Separating Terms
text: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following: $$\frac{12q^2}{3q}+\frac{3q}{3q}-\frac{1}{3q}$$
speech: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following:  fraction, 12 q squared, over, 3 q,  plus, fraction, 3 q, over, 3 q,  minus, fraction, 1 over, 3 q,

title: Simplify Terms
text: What is the result once each fraction term is simplified?
